title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.11 - Stopping, standing and parking
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.11 - Stopping, standing and parking

State Regulations

Traffic shall not stop, stand or park upon any part of the
vehicular crossings, except: (a) when
necessary to avoid injury or damage to persons or property; (b) in compliance with the direction of an
employee of the Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority, properly identified, or
a New York City police officer or a traffic signal; (c) when paying tolls; or
(d) when disabled. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
